name: Mathematic
short_content: Mathematics is an area of knowledge, which includes the study of such topics as numbers, formulas and related structures, shapes and spaces in which they are contained, and quantities and their changes

name: Everything You Need to Know About the World and How It Works
short_content: Everything You Need to Know About the World and How It Works encapsulates centuries of scientific thought in one volume. Natural phenomena, revolutionary inventions, scientific facts, and the most up-to-date questions are all explained in detailed text that is complemented by visually arresting graphics

name: The Vintage Guide to Love and Romance
short_content: Jessica Beam is a girl who knows how to party. Only lately she's been forgetting to turn up for work on time. Or in clean clothes. Down on her luck, out of a job and homeless, Jess seeks the help of her long-lost grandmother

name: Love and Retribution
short_content: Reno and Trina are back, but this time they bring hunky Tommy Gabrini and his tall, gorgeous, African-American ladylove along for the ride.

name: The Power of Habit: Why We Do What We Do in Life and Business
short_content: A young woman walks into a laboratory. Over the past two years, she has transformed almost every aspect of her life. She has quit smoking, run a marathon, and been promoted at work. The patterns inside her brain, neurologists discover, have fundamentally changed.

name: The Personal MBA: Master the Art of Business
short_content: The consensus is clear: MBA programs are a waste of time and money. Even the elite schools offer outdated assembly-line educations about profit-and-loss statements and PowerPoint presentations.

name: All about self Care
short_content: The female cofounders of a wellness start-up struggle to find balance between being good people and doing good business, while trying to stay BFFs

name: An Everyday Guide to Caring for Self While Caring for Others
short_content: A longtime trauma worker, Laura van Dernoot Lipsky offers a deep and empathetic survey of the often-unrecognized toll on those working to make the world a better place.

name: Magical Ways to Pamper, Soothe, and Care for Your Body and Spirit
short_content: Self-care and magic work together in this guide to help you become the best version of yourself.

name: Types and Programming Languages
short_content: A comprehensive introduction to type systems and programming languages.A type system is a syntactic method for automatically checking the absence of certain erroneous behaviors by classifying program phrases according to the kinds of values they compute

name: The C Programming Language
short_content: This book is meant to help the reader learn how to program in C. It is the definitive reference guide, now in a second edition. Although the first edition was written in 1978, it continues to be a worldwide best-seller.

name: SQL, PL/SQL: The Programming Language of Oracle
short_content: Excellent starting point if you are wanting to learn this programming language, could be used in addition oto other advanced books in the subject
